attributes.action: Cancel 'Festival Of Britain' and give the money to our NHS
attributes.additional_details: The Coronavirus outbreak could make such gatherings dangerous and the vast sums of money needed to plan and put on this event are much needed by our NHS
attributes.background: Cancel the planned celebratory 'Festival Of Britain' and divert all funds to our NHS.
